favourite.article: Yes, indeed I belong to Jesus, He is my Lord and King, nothing can hurt or harm me, He died for me, I am His and He is mine, He will surely keep my soul... and I will be with my precious Saviour there in His royalty. This is encouraging to me, a child of God.
Ohh Lord Jesus! You will keep my soul... As I belong to you.. I AM NOT MY OWN. I BELONG TO JESUS!!!.
Yes, I belong to Jesus. I'm not my own.
Yes I belong to the Only Lord of all Lords, King of all kings, Jesus Christ, who died for my sins and rose again. Amen and Amen.
What a great song, we must belong to Jesus, because He stands tall above all things.

In our consecration that we belong to Him, we should also have assurance that Satan has no way in us to hurt or harm (stanza 3) because of our Lord's nearness and dearness. Our precious Lord stands near us and Satan flees.
